definitions.definition: to make a continuous low sound:
examples: The computers were humming in the background.

definitions.definition: to sing without opening your mouth:
examples: She hummed to herself as she walked to school.

definitions.definition: to be busy and full of activity, excitement, sounds, or voices:
examples: The bar was really humming last night.
Our house is on a main road, so we can hear the constant hum of traffic.
